name: Lost & Pound
description:
Made as a solo entry to the Global Game Jam 2021!  Please note it's very janky and you have to force quit to get out, but I need sleep before fixing anything :D

----------------------------------------

Find some poor lost doggos the loving homes they deserve.

How to play:

  • Click on any of the dogs in your care to find out more about their attributes and needs. 
  • Memorise as much information as you can, but hurry because the adoption requests are about to come flooding in! 
  • Create a suitable match between adoption request and a dog and your rating will climb. Make poor matches and your job could be at risk!
